comment.body: Someone pedophile retard named Renato186a has been spamming CP on a bunch of zites, I stopped seeding all of them because of him. Could you add this person to the blacklist?

> [kaffie](#comment_70_1NWh3WAty57FH8at1WtrZigMrdhrDkuPzh): Do you have his public address? or a link to a post by him on zerotalk or something?

It was on ZeroUp and (I think) 0list spamming CP. I don't have any clue what you mean by public address.
Also zalox@zeroid.bit is a spammer, see http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AvF5TpcaamRNtqvN1cnDEWzNmUtD47Npg
RAcist spammer: loli1488@zeroid.bit, seen on same chatroom
